description: This Rust source file implements the PerformanceMetricsPlugin struct, which provides metrics logging functionalities for performance, state, and browser events within a plugin architecture. It includes trait implementations for logging metrics, managing plugin state, and handling browser events.

classes.name: PerformanceMetricsPlugin
classes.description: Main plugin struct implementing metrics logging interfaces, managing enabled state and internal plugin state.

classes.name: PluginState
classes.description: Enum representing the internal state of the plugin, either Running or Suspended.

methods.name: default
methods.description: Creates a new instance of PerformanceMetricsPlugin with default enabled state (false) and suspended state.

methods.name: is_enabled
methods.description: Checks if metrics logging is currently enabled.

methods.name: log_counter
methods.description: Logs a counter metric with a given name and value.

methods.name: log_gauge
methods.description: Logs a gauge metric with a given name and value.

methods.name: log_timing
methods.description: Logs a timing metric with a given name and duration.

methods.name: resumed
methods.description: Logs a state transition to resumed.

methods.name: suspended
methods.description: Logs a state transition to suspended.

methods.name: load_finished
methods.description: Logs the completion of a page load with URL, HTTP status, success flag, and total success/failure counts.

methods.name: url_change
methods.description: Logs a URL change event with the new URL and load status.

methods.name: visibility_change
methods.description: Logs a change in page visibility (hidden or visible).

methods.name: page_closure
methods.description: Logs the event of page closure.
